title: DrinkingWaterTreatment - Drinking Water Simulation
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic simulation of a drinking water treatment process (e.g. coagulation). It captures the model used and key simulated or measured output variables.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be DrinkingWaterSimulation

ftu_section.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'FTU'. Simulated or measured turbidity of the section expressed as Formazin Turbidity Units.

model.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Text. Model used for the simulation (e.g. PhysicsModel, DataDrivenModel, HybridModel).
